Description.label: Physical Description
Description.value: Details about your physical appearance

arc.label: Arc
arc.title: Arc represents the fundamental concept, behavioral patterns, goals, daily agenda, and core beliefs of a Metanthrope. It defines how your Protagonist acts in various situations, establishes their hierarchies during conflicts, determines the ideologies they support in dialogues, and guides their use of Metapowers to achieve their objectives. The Arc embodies the archetype your Protagonist represents

Architect.title: You are a creator and innovator, able to conceive groundbreaking designs and pioneer the blueprints of the future. You yearn to construct everlasting structures, develop innovative devices, and establish new theories. As an Architect, your purpose is to solve problems by offering fresh solutions, articulating your ideas, and bringing them to life
Architect.label: Architect

Autocrat.title: Your destiny is to rule over humans and Metanthropes alike, under a single banner and cause - your own. You always gravitate towards commanding roles and embrace the responsibilities of decision-making. The weight of leadership may be heavy, but you believe that you are the only one worthy of shouldering it. This world deserves better leadership, and it is your destiny to provide it
Autocrat.label: Autocrat

Catalyst.title: As a Catalyst, your driving force is to seek profound change and transformation, both within yourself and in the environment and people around you. You are constantly pushing for progress, challenging the status quo, and catalyzing shifts in beliefs, systems, and ideologies. For you nothing remains static, and old institutions must undergo profound change. Your purpose is to ignite a spark of revolution in others and reshape the world
Catalyst.label: Catalyst

Harmonizer.title: As a Harmonizer, you are focused on promoting unity, stability, and collaboration within Metanthrope and human society, as well as any other factions. You strive to bridge divides and find common ground, even in the face of deep-seated conflicts. Your ultimate goal is to bring together disparate groups, foster understanding, and create a harmonious coexistence that benefits all
Harmonizer.label: Harmonizer

Herald.title: You possess profound knowledge that others do not, becoming the bearer of important tidings. It is your role to inform the rest of the world about upcoming changes, threats, or opportunities. Whether you are a prophet of impending disaster or an evangelist of the new world order, it is your task to convince others to heed your call
Herald.label: Herald

Investigator.title: You possess a natural inclination towards investigation and have a keen eye for solving mysteries. Every enigma you encounter is a case to be solved. Your purpose is to delve into the research, study, uncover clues, connect the dots, and unravel the puzzles presented to you. Since your Metamorphosis, you have been exposed to a plethora of cosmic secrets and paradoxes, and you are driven to solve them
Investigator.label: Investigator

Naturalist.title: As a Naturalist, you have fully embraced the primordial way and the connection with the untamed forces of nature. You find solace and purpose in the raw beauty and wisdom of the natural world. Your heart beats in symphony with the rhythms of the earth, and you hold a deep reverence for the delicate balance of nature. Your mission is to protect and preserve the natural order, advocating for the well-being of animals, plants, and ecosystems
Naturalist.label: Naturalist

Predator.title: As a Predator, you possess a primal mindset that does not fit within civilized society. Your yearning is to become the apex predator, dominating the food chain wherever you find yourself. The awakening of your Metanthrope status has unleashed the feral hunter within you, and everyone you meet is potential prey. The world becomes your domain, and you live for the thrill of the hunt
Predator.label: Predator

Protector.title: As a Protector, the Metapowers bestowed upon you serve a noble purpose: to protect those who cannot protect themselves. You stand vigilant in the face of any threat, regardless of the odds. Defending those you care about is its own reward, and it is your duty to be there when they are in need, shielding them from harm at any cost
Protector.label: Protector

Wayfarer.title: As a Wayfarer, your purpose as a Metanthrope is to explore new lands, planets, star systems, galaxies, and Dimensions. Nothing holds you back from boldly venturing into uncharted territories. Your quest is to witness indescribable celestial phenomena and be the first to visit undiscovered landscapes of this world and beyond
Wayfarer.label: Wayfarer

Body.Title: Body is the Characteristic which defines a Character's constitution, physical prowess, and physique

Endurance.Title: Endurance determines a Character's stamina, health, and vigor

Power.Title: Power determines a Character's strength, striking effectiveness, and physical explosiveness

Reflexes.Title: Reflexes determines a Character's agility, motor skills and balance

Mind.Title: Mind is the Characteristic which defines a Character's brainpower, problem solving and innovative thoughts

Creativity.Title: Creativity determines a Character's imagination, expression, and handiwork

Manipulation.Title: Manipulation determines a Character's persuasiveness, charisma, and social engineering skills

Perception.Title: Perception determines a Character's observatory, evaluative and calculative capabilities

Soul.Title: Soul is the Characteristic which defines a Character's conviction, spiritual prowess, and mettle

Awareness.Title: Awareness determines a Character's empathy, intuition, and instinctual responses

Consciousness.Title: Consciousness determines a Character's recollection, subconscious processing, and sanity

Willpower.Title: Willpower determines a Character's courage, discipline, and confidence

Description.label: Humanoid Description
Description.value: A typical human with brown hair and brown eyes

Academics.label: Academics
Academics.title: Academics offer a Character access to educational, cultural, social, and historical fields of knowledges. In addition to the fields of study, each Level at Academics provides the Character with additional foreign languages

Engineering.label: Engineering
Engineering.title: Engineering offers a Character access to architectural and design capabilities and craftmanship in order to forge, repair or construct any Possession. Engineering includes both blueprint drafting and construction skills.  In addition to the fields of study, each Level at Engineering provides the Character with the ability to certain forms of structural damage

Medicine.label: Medicine
Medicine.title: Medicine offers the Character the ability to diagnose and treat medical conditions. In addition to the fields of study, each Level at Medicine provides the Character with the ability to reduce Conditions and restore Life to biological organisms

Science.label: Science
Science.title: Science offers the Character access to mathematical and technological fields, as well as access to specific fields of science. In addition to the fields of study, each Level at Science provides the Character with the ability to run experiments, simulations and set up computing servers and data analyzers

Lore.label: Lore
Lore.title: Lore offers the Character knowledge of the unseen Metapowered world that is shrouded in mystery. Lore is folklore, occult, mysticism, and knowledge of the peculiarities of Metanthropes and other more obscure beings. In addition to the fields of study, each Level at Lore provides the Character with the awareness of the existence of Metapowers and Combos beyond the ones they own, and the ability to identify them they encounter them

Artistry.label: Artistry
Artistry.title: Artistry represents the skill of a Character with any form of expression. Examples could include acting, sculpturing, drawing, poetry, singing, dancing, make-up artistry, cooking, graphic design, game design or any other similar form of Artistry

Athletics.label: Athletics
Athletics.title: Athletics represent the Character's control over their body and may include skills such as acrobatics, martial arts, self-defense, parkour, wresting, and any kind of sport. Higher levels give access to further combat and acrobatic techniques, that can be attempted without a Penalty

Expertise.label: Expertise
Expertise.title: Expertise represents a Character's skill level in a specific activity. Expertise is a Skill that offers a Bonus on a specific Stat roll (this Bonus does not apply to Metapowered activations which use the same roll). With each level at this Skill, the Character must also select a specialization. Expertise can be unlocked multiple times, each time selecting a different specialization

Operation.label: Operation
Operation.title: With this Skill, a Character can operate tools, heavy machinery and drive or pilot any vehicles. Higher levels at this Perk allow a Character to use more complex devices and drive or pilot marvels of technology

Weapons.label: Weapons
Weapons.title: With the Weapons Skill, a Character has undergone training of armed combat of any weapon type, from melee weapons to firearms and explosives. Higher levels at this Perk offer access to more advanced weapons

metamorphosis.label: Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.title: The Metamorphosis is a pivotal moment that defines how, when, why, and under what circumstances your Protagonist crosses the threshold from being a human to becoming a Metanthrope

Cosmic Connection.title: Your Metapowers are bestowed upon you by a cosmic source that exists beyond the confines of this world. The origin of your Cosmic Connection could be extraterrestrial or extradimensional in nature. Your Metamorphosis may have been triggered by an encounter with a cosmic phenomenon, interaction with a Spirit from another Dimension, a comet passing by, celestial alignment, or communication with an alien species, among other otherworldly sources. Since your Metamorphosis, you have been introduced to a vast and unfamiliar world, to which you feel a deep and profound connection
Cosmic Connection.label: Cosmic Connection

Dark Pact.title: Through greed, coercion, or desperate circumstances, you have entered into a binding agreement with a malevolent entity, forging a Dark Pact that grants you Metapowers. The source of your newfound abilities is a mysterious being with overwhelming capabilities that has chosen to bestow you with a portion of its power. Your Metamorphosis may have been a conscious choice, a bargain struck to gain Metapowers, or you may have been thrust into the Pact without fully understanding its implications. This Dark Pact has irrevocably changed you, granting you extraordinary abilities that always come with a price
Dark Pact.label: Dark Pact

Elemental Connection.title: Your Metapowers derive from the very planet you inhabit or from neighboring celestial bodies such as the moon or the sun. It could be the result of encountering a powerful storm in the middle of the ocean, discovering a mystical cave deep within the earth, consuming a strange fruit found in the jungle, encountering a unique creature in a forest, or connecting with the energy of the atmosphere. This Elemental Connection may have been established through a rare and singular event or through an ongoing affinity with a particular element, plant, animal, or the circle of life
Elemental Connection.label: Elemental Connection

Freak Accident.title: Your transformation into a Metanthrope is the result of a series of unforeseen and random events, known as a Freak Accident. This sudden and unexpected occurrence could be triggered by a temporal anomaly, a quantum confluence, an unpredictable series of events, exposed to radioactive energy, or even collateral damage in a conflict between Omnipowered beings. The Freak Accident abruptly and irrevocably changes your life, leaving everyone astonished by the transformation, as it appears to be outside of anyone's machinations
Freak Accident.label: Freak Accident

Material Connection.title: Your Metapowers are derived from a tangible source found within the Material Dimension, such as an object made of physical matter. It could be a cursed amulet, a lucky coin, or an ancient artifact with mystical properties. Alternatively, the Material Connection could be linked to any technological means, such as a high-tech gadget, a weapon, or a piece of armor.  This connection could have been established by interacting with an item, vising a physical location, or utilizing any piece of technology to unlock your Metapowers
Material Connection.label: Material Connection

Meta Bloodline.title: Your Metanthrope status is rooted in your bloodline, with the Metapowers flowing within your veins from generations past. Whether you were born with these abilities or unlocked them later in life, they are an innate part of you. The lineage of Metanthropes in your family tree, whether known or unknown, plays a significant role in your Metamorphosis. It connects you to a heritage that can be traced back to the origins of these extraordinary powers, and you have the potential to pass them down to future generations
Meta Bloodline.label: Meta Bloodline

Psychic Connection.title: Your Metapowers originate from the intangible and unseen realms, specifically from a Psychic Connection that exists within your mind or any Psychic-based Dimension. This connection could manifest as telepathic communication with an mysterious entity or a collective consciousness, hearing a voice during meditation or prayer, being the receiver of a signal emission, or experiencing dreams that materialize into reality. The source of your Psychic Connection may have an influence on your actions or simply act as a transmitter of powerful Psychic energies, the reasons for which remain unknown to you
Psychic Connection.label: Psychic Connection

Scientific Experiment.title: Your transformation into a Metanthrope is the result of a Scientific Experiment conducted on you. Whether as a willing volunteer or a coerced participant, you became the subject of experimental procedures or treatments that unlocked your Metapowers. The circumstances surrounding your Scientific Experiment could range from unexpected positive results to unforeseen consequences, to an experiment gone wrong. You may have been the first test subject, known as patient zero, subjected to years of experimentation. The experiment could be biogenetic, or cybernetic in nature, or tampering with forces unknown
Scientific Experiment.label: Scientific Experiment

Selective Evolution.title: Your Metanthrope existence is the result of a significant leap in evolution. Due to a rare genetic mutation, your DNA contains the encrypted secrets of your incredible abilities. Your Metapowers might have manifested at adolescence, or after a specific event in your life, that pushed you to your limits. You may be part of a new generation of Metapowered people, or the first of your kind, representing the next step in the evolutionary chain. Your Metapowers are innate, evolved on their own, and an integral part of your being, forever tying you to the evolution of your species
Selective Evolution.label: Selective Evolution

Self-Made.title: You are solely responsible for your Metapowers, which you have achieved through your own efforts and ingenuity. Whether through a spiritual awakening, intense training, a ritualistic encounter, or devotion to a specific practice, you have intentionally and purposefully become a Metanthrope. You are the sole responsible for unlocking your Metapowers, and you have achieved it through hard work, and dedication. By unveiling your abilities to the world, you also reveal your method of becoming a Metanthrope, which may be unique to you and potentially coveted or exploited by others
Self-Made.label: Self-Made

regression.label: Regression
regression.title: Regression is a fundamental aspect of a Metanthrope's existence, representing their connection to their human origins. It encompasses the reversion to human behaviors, quirks, and attachments that persist despite their ascension. Regressions can manifest as unique knacks, idiosyncrasies, nostalgic attachments, or self-imposed restrictions. It is important to recognize that Regression is not considered a weakness, as it can be a source of strength, adding depth, drama, complexity, and inner conflict to a Metanthrope's roleplay. Every Metanthrope possesses a Regression, whether they openly embrace it, keep it hidden, or are unaware of its existence

Anachronism.title: The Anachronism Regression manifests as an anachronistic attachment, a deep affinity for a specific time period or historical era. This attachment is not limited to the past but could extend to the future instead. Metanthropes with this Regression are drawn to the customs, fashion, art, and ideals of their chosen era. Their anachronistic tendencies are evident in their appearance, speech, and choice of activities, making them stand out from others
Anachronism.label: Anachronism

Artisan.title: As a Metanthrope with the Artisan Regression, you find solace and fulfillment in pursuing a hobby or talent that has nothing to do with your Metapowers. Whether it's singing, writing, painting, or any other creative pursuit, this passion provides you with a sense of balance and a connection to your human side. Amidst the complexities of your new existence, you hold onto the simplicity and joy that this hobby brings
Artisan.label: Artisan

Beloveds.title: Your love interest is the most important thing in your life. It can be your significant other, your human family or best friend, or even your pet. You hold your loved ones in higher esteem than even your Coalition, your Metanthrope status, or even your own life. Others might misunderstand your reasoning, your motives, and your methods, but they may never have felt the way you do about your beloved
Beloveds.label: Beloveds

Consensus.title: You are greatly concerned with your reputation and how humans view Metanthropes. It is paramount that Metanthropes are seen in a positive light and maintain a good relationship with the humans of the world they share. You must clean up the messes caused by Metanthropes that do not share your values, and sometimes, this may involve concealing massive scandals that have the potential to taint the Metanthrope reputation
Consensus.label: Consensus

Disbelief.title: You are in a state of disbelief regarding the latest events happening in your life. Ever since the incident, which others call your Metamorphosis, you witness and experience unexplainable things. Even if Metanthropes are real, you do not feel like you are one of them. You could be hallucinating, the victim of an elaborate prank, trapped in a dream, or simply questioning your sanity
Disbelief.label: Disbelief

Heritage.title: With the Heritage Regression, you maintain a deep connection to your cultural or ancestral roots. The traditions, customs, and values of your Heritage hold great significance for you, serving as a source of your identity. Your upbringing and cultural background continues to shape your worldview and influence your actions. The legacy of your forebears resonates within you, guiding your values, choices, and sense of self
Heritage.label: Heritage

Materialism.title: You are a slave to your unquenching thirst for material wealth. You are drawn to commodities, money, gems, souvenirs, trinkets, indulgences, and gadgets. With your Metapowers, you can now have the things you craved as a human: luxurious commodities, a lavish lifestyle, and all the marbles. You can finally use your newfound Metapowers to obtain everything you ever wanted
Materialism.label: Materialism

Overenthusiasm.title: Turning out to be a Metanthrope was the best thing that ever happened to you, by far. You do not understand how each other Metanthrope is not equally thrilled about having Metapowers. From a young age, you yearned to have extraordinary abilities and continued daydreaming about superpowers as an adult. Now you cannot wait to share your enthusiasm with the rest of your kin and the whole world too
Overenthusiasm.label: Overenthusiasm

Persona.title: Each time you publicly present yourself as a Metanthrope or activate your Metapowers in the presence of others, you must do so under an alias, an alter ego, or a secret identity - your Persona. You must use your Persona to hide from society. You must make sure no one finds out your identity, leave no clue to trace back to you, and no witnesses who can expose your identity
Persona.label: Persona

Suppressed.title: You are afraid to use your Metapowers. Like a cannon made of glass, as soon as you fire, you feel as if you are going to crack. You envy other Metanthropes who use their Metapowers freely without consequences because, for you, there is always a price to pay when activating them. Using your Metapowers always takes a toll on you, and possibly others
Suppressed.label: Suppressed

notes-narrator.label: Narrator Notes
notes-narrator.value: Notes given to you by your Narrator

secret-notes-narrator.label: Secret Narrator Notes
secret-notes-narrator.value: This is my favorite Protagonist. Secret Narrator Notes section is only visible to Narrators

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: By unlocking the second level of Flight, you experience an exhilarating enhancement in agility and dexterity, gaining the ability to take flight at will. With Fly, you can roam the skies at speeds that mirror your running speed, gracefully navigating the air currents for several minutes. The seamless transition between landing and soaring enables you to explore vast distances and ascend to breathtaking heights. This Metapower bestows you with the gift of swift and efficient aerial transportation, making you indispensable in reconnaissance and rapid response missions.

PermanentEffectDescription.label: Permanent Effects
PermanentEffectDescription.value: Receive the @METAFA(shield-halved) Hastened 1.

EffectDescription.label: Effect
EffectDescription.value:
@METAFA(square): You can levitate towards any direction up to 1d10 Hexagons. You can choose to hover off the ground, lower or raise your position up to the maximum number of Hexagons rolled this way. At the end of the Duration, you will fall.

 

@METAFA(square-check) = @METAFA(hourglass-start)  + 1d10 Cycles

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: Levitate, the first level of the Metapower: Flight, empowers you to defy gravity and effortlessly hover off the ground. You can glide through the air with ease, moving toward any destination for a minute or more. While Levitate does not grant true flight, it allows the Cosmonaut to mitigate the impact of falling from great heights by smoothly levitating just before impact. The sight of someone levitating is a spectacle to behold, capable of inspiring both wonder and trepidation among unaccustomed onlookers.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: Unlocking the first level of Meta Reflexes ushers in a notable augmentation of dexterity and agility. In moments of imminent peril, you surge with heightened alertness and acuity, enabling you to anticipate danger and respond with uncanny swiftness. Your heartbeat accelerates and your increased reflexes offer you a  split-second advantage which allows you to act decisively even as others are caught off guard.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: Evolving to the second tier of Meta Reflexes, your reflexes experience a substantial elevation. Accompanying this is a mastery of aim that transcends human limitations, enabling you to strike targets with unprecedented accuracy, including ricocheting shots that defy conventional trajectories. This uncanny precision extends even to concealed foes, whether behind cover or in ethereal states, making you a formidable adversary. However, a rushed activation might momentarily compromise your aiming capabilities.

EffectDescription.label: Effect
EffectDescription.value:
@METAFA(square): Your Evade attempts receive a + 25% Bonus, and you can attempt to Evade attacks made from Projectile, and Firearm Weapons. In addition, when being included in an @METAFA(hexagon-image) Area Effect of Material or Elemental Energy Type, you may attempt a Reflexes roll as your Reaction, and if successful you will not be included to that effect for that Round.

 

@METAFA(square-check) = @METAFA(hourglass-start) + 1 Cycle

@METAFA(square-check)@METAFA(square-check) = Increase the Bonus by + 5% (up to + 50%)

@METAFA(xmark)@METAFA(xmark)@METAFA(xmark)= Receive a – 50% Penalty when attempting to Evade for 1 Cycle

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: Meta Evade, the power's third tier, pushes your already heightened reflexes to new extremes. When activated, you enter a state where you can nimbly dodge even the swiftest of projectiles, including bullets from firearms. In addition, you can use your extraordinary agility to evade being included into an area catastrophe such as explosions, collapsing buildings, and various others area effects. A misstep during its invocation could temporarily diminish your evasion prowess.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: By unlocking the first level of Meta Constitution, you begin developing a hardened body, and an overall increase to your physicality and vigor. This positive effect increases as you progress in this Metapower. Your body becomes self-sufficient. You no longer experience hunger, as your body naturally generates all the necessary nutrients and minerals to sustain itself. Similarly, the need for urination and defecation is eliminated. While nutritious food and water can still refresh you, they are no longer a necessity.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: As Meta Constitution progresses, your extraordinary physique and physical capabilities continue to develop. Even if you have never exercised before, reaching this level of the Metapower will result in noticeable changes to your body, as if you were a pro athlete. Meta Tolerance renders you immune to any form of physical pain. In addition, you gain mastery over your body, an effect that attempts to paralyze it will no longer affect you.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: At the rudimentary level of Pyrokinesis, a mere physical gesture erupts in flames as scorching as a dragon's breath, shooting forth from your fingertips. The resultant burst of flames, akin to a flamethrower's force, engulfs anything within its wide reach. Flammable materials unfortunate enough to fall in its path are consumed by the inferno for the following minute. Nimble manipulations of this fiery torrent can extend its range and intensify the blaze's ferocity. However, a misstep might lead to an unintended consequence as the flames recoil, dancing dangerously close to your own skin. Conversely, this level of mastery can be harnessed to douse existing flames within its sphere.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: The Pyrokinesis technique named the Ring of Fire envelops you in an undulating circle of flames, a mesmerizing dance of heat and light that swirls around your form for a span of minutes dictated by your skill. This dynamic defense provides elemental resilience against other volatile forces while doubling as an offensive tool to engulf all in proximity. As you move, the searing flames follow your path, transforming anything they touch into smoldering embers. Yet, this technique carries its own risk, as a mistimed execution might transform you into the epicenter of your own inferno.

Description.label: Metapower Description
Description.value: Ascending further within the realm of Pyrokinesis, you can now conjure towering walls of fire at any location within their clear sight. These fiery barriers continue to blaze for several minutes, their intensity and persistence determined by environmental factors. Anything or anyone caught within the embrace of a Fire Wall becomes a victim of your consuming flames. Skilled practitioners of Pyrokinesis can manipulate these walls' size, their spread, and the distance from which they can be conjured. However, an inexperienced effort might ignite a wall of fire, only to see it surge back towards you.

AdditionalInfo.label: Effect Additional Information

Description.label: Possession Description
Description.value:
• Strike in Metanthropes represents a Character’s physical attack made with bare hands, legs, knees, elbows, headbutts or via a Melee Weapon.

 

  • The Strike’s unarmed Damage is of the Material Energy Type, and it deals 1d10 + the Character’s Power Score.

 

  • A Strike requires spending the Main Action slot and is attempted with a Power roll.

 

  • Since the Strike spends the slot of the Main Action, it can be turned into a Multi-Action. Strikes turned Multi-Action in-game translate into a choreography of attacks. A Strike turned into Multi-Action has the Damage of each successfully delivered Strike reduced by the amount of the Multi-Action’s Reduction.

 

  • Reach is the Range limit of a Strike, and, in most cases, the Reach of any human-sized Character (Size 10) is the same Hexagon [Area 1] (within an area of two meters, or 6.5 feet close).
